ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 36
ygData.msgSnippet: I think everybody is missing the point that he is an avatar for a god. That, in my book, says that he can be diff. from normal rangers. Neran GoldenLeaf Xegony
ygData.messageBody:
I think everybody is missing the point that he is an avatar for a god.
That, in my book, says that he can be diff. from normal rangers.

Neran GoldenLeaf
Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: Tim West <twest@...>
> Yes, he is a GM. In fact this character is used by Brad McQuaid
(spelling)
> who is the head programmer for the game. That is why his ranger can use
> the sword. Check out the picture of him at the Fires Of Heaven website
> under "The Killing Of Lady Vox".
>
> Tanaman
>
